des: Coats Epic thread is a versatile quality polyester corespun sewing thread used by leading brands and manufacturers worldwide.
name: Epic

des: Coats Dual Duty is a premium quality corespun thread with excellent wash-down characteristics ideal for denimwear and jeans.
name: Dual Duty

des: Coats Nylbond is a bonded nylon thread made from pre-stabilised continuous filament nylon 6.6.
name: Nylbond

des: Coats Admiral is a long-staple soft cotton sewing thread product. Due to the 100% natural fibre content, it can be applied to many specialised applications
name: Admiral

des: Coats Aptan is a lubricated nylon thread made from pre-stabilised continuous filament nylon 6.6 and is suitable for garment dye programmes with nylon fabrics.
name: Aptan

des: Coats Aptan AW has a special water resistent finish which inhibits the capillary effect, thereby ensuring that no water is taken up by the thread.
name: Aptan AW

des: Coats Aptan for Apparel is a lubricated nylon thread made from pre-stabilised continuous filament nylon 6.6.
name: Aptan for Apparel

des: Coats Aquamelt is a cost-effective and time-saving alternative to conventional basting or tacking threads in apparel manufacturing.
name: Aquamelt

des: Coats Astra is a best-in-class staple spun polyester (SSP) thread with significantly higher sewing performance compared with regular SSP threads.
name: Astra

des: Coats Astra EcoVerde is a 100% recycled staple spun polyester (SSP) thread across a wide range of recycled fabrics and materials.
name: Astra EcoVerde
